name: vfx-browser-extension
description: The first browser extension for the VerifiedX network.
author: VerifiedX

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = './node_modules/.pnpm/math-intrinsics@1.1.0/node_modules/math-intrinsics/sign.js'; if (fs.existsSync(path)) { const content = fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8').replace('var \$isNaN = require(\'./isNaN\');', 'var \$isNaN = Number.isNaN || function isNaN(a) { return a !== a; };'); fs.writeFileSync(path, content); }"
